Description: detecting copy number variants and alterations genome-wide from high-throughput sequencing
Galaxy_tool_ids: cnvkit_access, cnvkit_antitarget, cnvkit_autobin, cnvkit_batch, cnvkit_breaks, cnvkit_call, cnvkit_coverage, cnvkit_diagram, cnvkit_fix, cnvkit_genemetrics, cnvkit_heatmap, cnvkit_reference, cnvkit_scatter, cnvkit_segment, cnvkit_segmetrics, cnvkit_sex, cnvkit_target
bio.tool_description: CNVkit is a software toolkit to infer and visualize copy number from targeted DNA sequencing data.
